wikitext.*:
The '''Australian Tolkien Society''' was founded by [[Paul Novitski]], a member of the [[Tolkien Society of America]] in [[1967]]  while on a trip to Australia. The society produced the Fanzine ''[[Carandaith]]'' and The Tolkien Bulletin (originally called the Australian Tolkien Society Newsletter).<ref>[[Bernie Zuber]], ''[[Mythlore 3]]'', "World of Fanzines"</ref><ref>{{webcite|author=|articleurl=https://fancyclopedia.org/Australian_Tolkien_Society|articlename=Australian Tolkien Society|dated=|website=[https://fancyclopedia.org/Fancyclopedia_3 Fancyclopedia 3]|accessed=24 March 2024}}</ref>
